text.commercialize.offer.tooltip.title: Public Offer
text.commercialize.delivery.signature: Public market order, paid in full. Thank you for using the automated market delivery network. Have a nice day!
text.commercialize.delivery.expiration_n: %s package(s) could not be delivered. Make sure you have a mailbox set up. Another delivery attempt will be made in %s (%s/%s).
%s package(s) could not be delivered. Make sure you have a mailbox set up. A final delivery attempt will be made in %s before %s/%s package(s) of the delivery are discarded (%s/%s).
text.commercialize.delivery.discard_noti: %s package(s) could not be delivered. The packages have been discarded.
text.autoconfig.commercialize.title: Commercialize
text.autoconfig.commercialize.option.req: Forces the player to have a bound payment card in their inventory for paying from account in the market. (Default: true)
text.autoconfig.commercialize.option.all: Allow Foreign Cards for Market Payment
Allow a player to pay using another player's account if they have a card bound to their account. (Default: true)
text.autoconfig.commercialize.option.gen: Randomly generate offers on the market automatically with procedural items, prices, player names and profiles. (Default: true)
text.autoconfig.commercialize.option.max: The maximum number of generated offers that can be active on the market at any time. (Default: 100)
text.autoconfig.commercialize.option.off: The number of offers that are generated in a single batch. (Default: 4)
The interval in ticks at which the market checks for expired offers to be removed. (Default: 100 ticks)
The interval in ticks at which new offers are attempted to be generated. (Default: 2,000 ticks)
text.autoconfig.commercialize.option.shi: The interval in ticks at which shipping blocks exchange items for currency. (Default: 24,000 ticks/1 day)
text.autoconfig.commercialize.option.buy: The factor applied when buying items from the general market, based off the item's base value. Applies to generated offers. (Default: 1.2)
text.autoconfig.commercialize.option.sel: The factor applied when selling items to the general market, based off the item's base value. Applies to the shipping block. (Default: 0.75)
text.autoconfig.commercialize.option.pri: The factor by which a determined market price can vary when generated. Applies to generated offers. (Default: 0.1)
text.autoconfig.commercialize.option.off: The default duration of market offers in ticks. (Default: 96,000 ticks = 4 days)
text.autoconfig.commercialize.option.max: The maximum number of offers sent to be listed on a market screen before getting truncated. (Default: 100)
text.autoconfig.commercialize.option.lis: The time in ticks after which the market screen automatically refreshes its listing. (Default: 600, 30 seconds)

The time in ticks after which the market screen automatically refreshes its listing when inactive (no open screen). Will effectively prefetch to have listing ready before player interacts with block. Set to -1 to disable. (Default: 6000, 5 minutes)
text.autoconfig.commercialize.option.use: Delivers market orders through the delivery network to a player's mailbox with variable delivery time. (Default: true)
text.autoconfig.commercialize.option.mai: The average time it takes for a market order to be delivered to a player's mailbox. (Default: 1200)
The interval in ticks to check if mail is ready to be delivered from the transit queue. (Default: 400)
The effective chance mail gets delivered when out for delivery. Can be decreased from 1.0 (100%) to randomly delay delivery to next tick. (Default: 1.0)
A string included in the mailbox name to mark it as the main delivery destination for market orders for a player.  (Default: '(M)')
text.autoconfig.commercialize.option.not: Send text message notifications to players when a delivery addressed to them could not be made (e.g., if they do not have a mailbox). (Default: true)
text.autoconfig.commercialize.option.max: The maximum number of attempts made to deliver packages to a player if it was previously not possible. (Default: 3)
text.autoconfig.commercialize.option.sus: Suspend Delivery Attempts for Offline Players
Do not deliver mail to players that are offline. Packages may be stuck in queue indefinitely if player has pending deliveries but never comes online again. (Default: true)
gui.commercialize.market.search_offers.t: Type to search for offers by name or description.
gui.commercialize.market.total.tooltip: The total amount to be paid for all selected items in the cart.
gui.commercialize.market.cash.tooltip: The amount of currency you have in your inventory and backpack.
gui.commercialize.market.account.tooltip: The amount of currency you have in your bank account.
gui.commercialize.market.specified_accou: The amount of currency %s have in their bank account.
gui.commercialize.market.inviable_accoun: Payment through an account other than your own is not allowed.
gui.commercialize.market.sort_mode.toolt: Selected: Sort by %s (%s). Click to cycle sorting modes.
gui.commercialize.market.filter_mode.too: Selected: Filter by %s. Click to cycle filter modes.
gui.commercialize.market.payment_mode.in: Selected: Pay with cash in your inventory or backpack. Click to cycle payment methods.
gui.commercialize.market.payment_mode.ac: Selected: Pay with balance in your bank account. Click to cycle payment methods.
gui.commercialize.market.payment_mode.sp: Selected: Pay with balance in %s's bank account. Click to cycle payment methods.
gui.commercialize.market.order_cart.tool: Confirm and order all selected items in cart.
gui.commercialize.market.empty_cart.tool: Remove all selected items from the cart.
gui.commercialize.market.order_confirm_s: Ordered %s for %s to be delivered to mailbox.
gui.commercialize.market.order_error_inv: Some orders may have expired and are no longer available.
No personal mailbox to receive market deliveries.
gui.commercialize.market.order_error_ins: Insufficient funds to complete the order.
gui.commercialize.market.order_error_inv: The selected payment method can not be used.
gui.commercialize.market.order_error_fai: Order could not be completed, market may be unavailable.
gui.commercialize.posting.post_offer.too: Dispatch item stack and post offer on market.
gui.commercialize.posting.reset_price.to: Set offer price to current market rate for item stack.
gui.commercialize.posting.clear_offer.to: Return item stack to inventory and reset all fields to defaults.
gui.commercialize.posting.posting_error_: Proposed offer is invalid and can not be posted.
Exceeded daily quota (%s/%s posts) for posting.
Could not post offer to the market.
